script: Congratulations! You have been accepted for an exchange semester at Nabson University in the US.
event1.question: Please make a payment of $20,000. Would you like to pay with your Cash or Endowus Wallet?

script: Hooray! You have been offered a 6-month internship at MBB & Co. Enjoy your time here & learn as much as possible from your supervisors.
event2.question: You have been paid a total of $6,000 over 6 months! Would you like to invest it with Endowus?

script: Congratulations! You have landed your first job at ShopForward! Be ready for more responsibilities!
event3.question: You have earned $100,000 over 2 years of working at ShopForward! Would you like to invest it with Endowus?

script: Hard work pays off! You have been promoted to a manager at ShopForward!
event4.question: Your pay has increased to $150,000 over the next 2 years of work! Would you like to invest it with Endowus?

script: Your new home is now ready! Time to collect your keys and move in!
event5.question: Your new home costs $200,000. Would you like to pay with your Cash or Endowus Wallet?
